alert.note: Alert for Craighead; Poinsett (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 21 at 4:19AM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of western Craighead and northwestern Poinsett Counties through 445 AM CDT... At 419 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Egypt, or 8 miles southwest of Bono, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Jonesboro, Bono, Brookland, Weiner, Cash, Egypt, Greenfield, Apt, Valley View, Farrville, Dorothy, Winesburg, Uno, Cary, Lanieve, Herndon, Pitts, Herman, Dryden and Risher. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
